title.narrative: Micro, Small & Medium Enterprise and Large Enterprise Supply Chain Finance

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve access to finance for micro, small and medium enterprises, and longer term finance to large enterprises involved in domestic supply chains.

condition.narrative: Change in sub-project eligibility criteria (see restructuring paper for more details)

Finance Agreement :Disbursement condition | Description :No withdrawal shall be made for payments made prior to the date of theLoan Agreement, except that withdrawals up to an aggregate amount not to exceed $30,000,000 may be made for payments made prior tothis date but on or after January 15, 2015, for Eligible Expenditures under the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
